mapper.insert: insert into bid ( productId, bidMemberId, bidPrice ) select #{productId}, #{bidMemberId}, #{bidPrice} from dual where exists ( select isProductCheck from product where productId = #{productId} and isProductCheck = 1 )
mapper.select: select bidMemberId from bid where productId = #{productId} and bidPrice = (select max(bidPrice) from bid);
